com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.map

Class MapOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.options.Options
        • com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.map.MapOptions

  • public class MapOptions
extends Options
    Configuration options for Map.
    See Also:
    Map Configuration Options

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MapOptions create()
      Default constructor.
      void setEnableScrollWheel(boolean enableScrollWheel)
      If set to true, enables zooming in and out using the mouse scroll wheel.
      void setLineColor(String lineColor)
      If showLine is true, defines the line color.
      void setLineWidth(String lineWidth)
      If showLine is true, defines the line width (in pixels).
      void setMapType(MapType mapType)
      The type of map to show.
      void setShowLine(boolean showLine)
      If set to true, shows a Google Maps polyline through all the points.
      void setShowTip(boolean showTip)
      If set to true, shows the location description as a tooltip when the mouse is positioned above a point marker.
      void setUseMapTypeControl(boolean useMapTypeControl)
      Show a map type selector that enables the viewer to switch between [map, satellite, hybrid, terrain].
      void setZoomLevel(int zoomLevel)
      An integer indicating the initial zoom level of the map.

      • setUseMapTypeControl

        public final void setUseMapTypeControl(boolean useMapTypeControl)
        Show a map type selector that enables the viewer to switch between [map, satellite, hybrid, terrain]. When useMapTypeControl is false (default) no selector is presented and the type is determined by the mapType option.
        Parameters:
        useMapTypeControl -

      • setZoomLevel

        public final void setZoomLevel(int zoomLevel)
        An integer indicating the initial zoom level of the map.
        Parameters:
        zoomLevel - 0 is completely zoomed out (whole world) and 19 is the maximum zoom level.
